entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
